item.title: It's official: Biden signs new law, designates bald eagle as 'national bird'
item.description: President Joe Biden signed a law Monday naming the bald eagle as the country's national bird.

item.title: Trump announces model and philanthropist Somers Farkas, auto giant John Arrigo for ambassadorships
item.description: Two more people were nominated on Tuesday to serve as ambassador during a second Trump administration, President-elect Trump said.
